Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.schedule.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
The Schedule class helps students build their own schedule using the course catalog
Author:
thanujdesu

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Schedule()
    Constructor for Schedule sets a title and creates a blank arrayList of Course objects

    • addCourseToSchedule

      public boolean addCourseToSchedule(Course c)
      adds a course to the schedule from the course catalog
      Parameters:
      c - course to add to schedule
      Returns:
      true if course added successfully, false if not
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if duplicate or conflicting courses

    • removeCourseFromSchedule

      Returns:
